name: CDEFG Matte Anti-Glare Screen Protector for Ford Edge 2021 2022 2023 2024 Accessories Screen Protector for Edge 2021-2024 SE, SEL, ST-Line, Titanium, ST 12" Matte Anti-Glare Tempered Glass

other_info.Compatible Devices: Ford Edge 2024 2023 2023 2021 (SE/ SEL/ ST-Line/ Titanium/ ST)
other_info.Compatible Phone Models: Ford Edge 2024 2023 2023 2021 (SE/ SEL/ ST-Line/ Titanium/ ST)

about_this_item: COMPATIBLE MODEL: Fit 12 inch 2021 2022 2023 2024 Ford Edge SE, SEL, ST-Line, Titanium and ST Sync4 Center Control Touchscreen. Please check your model whether is same with description.
STEADY & HD: Sturdy enough, not easy to break. Powerful accessories, compatible with 2021 - 2024 Ford Edge GPS screen well. HD display make you screen as claer as original screen.
TOUCH SENSITIVITY: This screen cover, just 0.25mm thick, makes the navigation screen work great with little to no glare, let you experience Original Touching Feel on Screen.
LESS FINGERPRINT: Our screen protector foils protects the screen from any potential scratch. With oil resistance coating, prevents fingerprints on the screen and has smooth touch to it.

EASY TO INSTALL: Just make sure to clean the screen with the wipe provided first and then with the cloth that came with it. There is no dust on the screen, then you can attach the touchscreen protector.
